meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Spirom's Privacy Policy. We explain our policies on collecting, using, and protecting your personal information.

sections.title: 1. Collection of Personal Information
sections.content: When you place an order or make an inquiry on our site, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, address, and phone number. This information is used for processing orders, shipping products, and responding to inquiries.

sections.title: 2. Purpose of Use
items: Service improvement and new service development

sections.title: 3. Disclosure to Third Parties
sections.content: We will not provide your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following cases:
items: When necessary to protect life, body, or property

sections.title: 4. Use of Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies to improve our services. Cookies are small data files stored in your browser and are used to analyze site usage and improve user experience.

sections.title: 5. Security
sections.content: We properly manage your personal information and take reasonable security measures, such as using SSL encryption, to prevent unauthorized access, loss, destruction, alteration, and leakage.

sections.title: 6. Contact Us
sections.content: For inquiries regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our Contact page.
